name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: CHECKY - 단 5초, GPT로 컨텐츠 한눈에 체크하고 광고 분류까지
name.en: CHECKY - Just enter the link. We'll save you time!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: CHECKY는 ChatGPT 기반 SEO, 플랫폼 보조 익스텐션입니다.
short.en: Just enter the link. We'll save you time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cheky is a simple MVP model. A link is input, the content of the link is crawled, paragraphs are extracted, and a summary is performed using GPT.
Already fine-tuned GPT shows optimal summary results. However, it is currently in its early stages and requires continuous updates. Additionally, the word cloud shown together has issues with canvas tags, which is the most urgent problem that needs to be improved.
